title: Delay after choosing Gas when sending tokens

labels.name: priority 2: medium
labels.description: an issue that is not severely affecting the overall app, it may interfere with some users users expe

labels.name: S:3
labels.description: We know what needs to be done, some extra steps, but thatâ€™s it, little to no unknowns

body:
There is a delay when choosing gas when trying to send a transaction.
 See continuous logs like below -

@Khushboo-dev-cpp could you confirm this is not happening anymore, I believe those calls were due to the time estimation loop which has been move to status-go and use a different algorithm which does only 1 request
